wikipedia_page.main: Leaf Daniell (1877 – 28 February 1913) was a British fencer. He won a silver medal in the team épée event at the 1908 Summer Olympics.

response: *Leaf Daniell (1877–1913), British fencer, silver medalist in the 1908 Olympics
